desc: From our original and ultra-thin tall boot socks, to fitness and toe-less socks, we design fun, beautiful socks to keep both you and your feet happy. Best of all - Foot Huggies are 100% made in the USA. All our socks are 70% COOLMAX ®, 3% Lycra®, 27% nylon.

layout.text: At Foot Huggies, we believe in comfort and style for your feet
